name: Remote System Discovery - ping sweep
description:
Identify remote systems via ping sweep.

Upon successful execution, cmd.exe will perform a for loop against the 192.168.1.1/24 network. Output will be via stdout.

input_arguments.name: stop_host
input_arguments.description: Last octet ending value for ping sweep.

input_arguments.name: start_host
input_arguments.description: Last octet starting value for ping sweep.
